```{r fuel-plot}
mtcars  %>% select(mpg, wt)  %>% 
ggplot(aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) + geom_point() + 
geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ x, se = FALSE) + 
theme_clean() + labs(title = "Fuel Efficiency and Weight", 
subtitle = "Heavier cars are less fuel efficent", x = "Weight (1000s of lbs)", 
y = "MPG", caption = "Henderson and Vellerman(1981)")
```
